nodes.text: The Mortex sector was a sector located within the Outer Rim Territories. It contained the planets Dakot Seven, Lotide, and Almania.

Hundreds of years before the Almanian Uprising of 17 ABY, the sector was invaded by an Almanian army general named Kueller. The sector had a Rebel Alliance cell established after the Battle of Yavin. Once the Alliance's influence spread across the region, the rebel leader Callus was appointed its sector commander.
